mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_TEL, JOINED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userTel}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_PW AS userPw, USER_NAME AS userName, USER_EMAIL AS userEmail, USER_TEL AS userTel, JOINED_AT AS joinedAt, USER_IMG AS userImg FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}

SELECT POST_IDX AS postIdx, POST_TITLE AS postTitle, POST_CONTENT AS postContent, CREATED_AT AS createdAt, POST_VIEWS AS postViews, POST_LIKES AS postLikes, USER_ID AS userId, POST_FILE_NAME AS postFileName, POST_FILE_PATH AS postFilePath FROM TB_POST ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT POST_IDX AS postIdx, POST_TITLE AS postTitle, POST_CONTENT AS postContent, CREATED_AT AS createdAt, POST_VIEWS AS postViews, POST_LIKES AS postLikes, USER_ID AS userId, POST_FILE_NAME AS postFileName, POST_FILE_PATH AS postFilePath FROM TB_POST WHERE POST_IDX = #{postIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_POST SET POST_VIEWS = POST_VIEWS + 1 WHERE POST_IDX = #{postIdx}
UPDATE TB_POST SET POST_LIKES = POST_LIKES + 1 WHERE POST_IDX = #{postIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT musical_id AS musicalId, musical_title AS musicalTitle, musical_poster AS musicalPoster musical_poster AS musicalPoster, musical_create AS musicalCreate FROM TB_MUSICAL

SELECT M.MUSICAL_ID AS musicalId, M.MUSICAL_TITLE AS musicalTitle, M.MUSICAL_POSTER AS musicalPoster, M.MUSICAL_ST_DT AS musical_ST, M.MUSICAL_ED_DT AS musical_ED, S.HALL_NAME AS hallName, S.SHOW_DT AS showDate, S.SHOW_RUNTIME AS showRuntime, S.SHOW_PRICE AS showPrice, S.SHOW_IMGS AS show_img, S.SHOW_VIEWS AS showViews FROM TB_MUSICAL M JOIN TB_SHOW S ON M.MUSICAL_ID = S.MUSICAL_ID WHERE M.MUSICAL_ID = #{musicalId}
